fulltext:
Lê Ngọc Trường
Junior Fullstack Software Developer
- I have 3 years experience in JAVACRIPT language
with some framework in FRONT-END like 2-years
angular js, 1-year angular, 1-year vue js, more than 3-
years REACT JS (1 year REACT NATIVE and NODE
JS (SAILS JS ,LOOP BACK, FEATHER JS Framework)
in the BACK-END.
- Not only that, I also have more than 2-year
experience in java language with Spring boot
framework. I can work with MVC, MVP, MVVM,
REDUX (react) model. 
- I also can self-learning another language for
enough to work about 1 or 2 months (I got 3 weeks
for PHP and LARAVEL framework and almost a
week for Spring Boot actually i already got JAVA
experience in the past so it doesn't matter with me). 
- About database system, I know how to set up and
config ORACLE Database, and write some batch file
for checking table-space, backup, log rotation. With
Database design and management i also can use
MySQL, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle. In NoSQL, I can
use FIREBASE and MONGO DB. 
- About the Source Structure, I know how to config a
pattern or design pattern for my own project. 
- About project process, I have more than one year
about agile with scrum framework (I have
customized it for my team). And I know exactly
process which is fit for a project.
- More about my personality, I usually go swimming
at the weekend and play music (like guitar,...) when
my code run well :))). I quite love the teamwork
SUMMARY EDUCATION
